#text=I was sitting on my couch when I decided that I had n't taken a bath in a while so I stood up and walked to the bathroom where I turned on the faucet in the sink and began filling the bath with hot water .
#text=While the tub was filling with hot water I put some bubble bath into the stream of hot water coming out of the faucet so that the tubbed filled with not only hot water , but bubbles .
#text=Once the tub was almost to the top I turned off the water so that none of the water would overflow onto the bathroom floor .
#text=I got undressed and entered the tub , making sure that it 's not very hot .

#text=I relax in the tub until I am happy with my bath and then I get out and dry off with a towel and then get dressed and laid down in my bed and took a nap , feeling very relaxed , content , and happy .
